title: The Legend of Zelda Turns 35! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.22.21
description:
Blessing and Fran celebrate Zelda's 35th anniversary and ask the question: What will Nintendo do for #Zelda35?

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:15 - Housekeeping
Me and Andy reacted live to the Behind The Scenes of Overwatch 2 presentation at BlizzCon. It’s a glorious 38 minutes that you can catch that right now on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
The latest Blessing Show episode is also up right now on Kinda Funny Games. That’s 8 minutes of me breaking down what’s up with the next-gen consoles now that we’re a few months past launch.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:06:45 - RIP DaftPunk
00:07:50 - The Legend of Zelda turns 35 years old -  Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:27:18 - BlizzCon 2021 round up - Felicia Miranda @ IGN
00:42:10 - A ‘Twisted Metal’ Series From ‘Deadpool’ Writers is in the Works at Sony Pictures TV, PlayStation Productions - Joe Otterson @ Variety
00:47:55 -  Ad
00:52:50 - CD Projekt Red is taking down stolen Gwent Code - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:56:50 - Rare's Cancelled N64 Game “Dinosaur Planet” has leaked online - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:59:23 - We’re about a year away from an AEW game - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
01:00:40 - Out today
01:01:50 - Squad Up:Andrew(PS5) - kfhelpme
01:03:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
